author: vkuznet
body: I found that Go TensorFlow stack is broken due to backward incompatible changes in ops module. This affects our ability to move forward with Go compiler version. Therefore I (temporary) remove tfaas from comp repository to allow to update Go compiler and upstream packages, such as DAS, exporters, etc. I'll revisit tfaas spec with newer compiler and once it is ready I'll put it back to comp repository.
title: Remove tfaas from comp repository and spec due to outdated Go TensorFlow stack
